project_descr: Development Advisory Services support to the UNDP Country Office

outputs.output_descr: This project represents the Development Advisory Services (DAS) Facility, which is intended to direclty support high priority frameworks and programming initiatives, such as Country Programmes, UNDAFs and new project initiatives.  DAS enhances the capacity of UNDP Country Offices to respond in a timely and flexible manner to the identified needs of the country.

project_title: support to programme development & policy dialogue
